import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Table } from '../TableUser' import { StyledButton } from '../styled/Button'; import { Box, BoxText, BoxTitle, Container } from '../styled/Home.styled'; import { RejectService,AcceptService,CancelService } from '../styled/Button'; import Popup from '../Popup/Popup'; import { InputFormTxt } from '../styled/Form.style'; export default function RecivedOrderPendingList({recievedOrderPendingData,errorRecievedOrderPending}) { const [buttonPopuPAccept,setButtonPopupAccept]=useState(false); const [buttonPopuPReject,setButtonPopupReject]=useState(false); const [actionData,SetactionData]=useState([]); return ( <> {console.log('inside',errorRecievedOrderPending)} {!errorRecievedOrderPending ? Service Price Buyer Buyer's Email Buyer's Phone Action Action {recievedOrderPendingData.length>0 && recievedOrderPendingData.map((pending)=>( <> {pending.service.title} {'$'+pending.price} {pending.users.name} {pending.users.email} {pending.users.phone} {SetactionData(pending);setButtonPopupAccept(true);}}>✓ {SetactionData(pending);setButtonPopupReject(true); } } >X ))} {console.log('action',actionData)} {actionData && <> {actionData?.service?.title} Update price:{actionData?.price} Accept } REJECT
: <> Message {errorRecievedOrderPending.message}
} ) }
